#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
		long long int n;
		cin >> n;
		if( n == 1){
			cout << "0\n";
		}
		else{long long int sum = 1;
		for(int j = 2; j <= sqrt(n); j++){
			if(n%j == 0){
				sum += j;
			
			long long int d = n/j;
			if( d != j)
				sum += d;
			}
		}
		cout << sum <<"\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
